item.description:
Hello all!

This is another hike to get ready for my other hike.

We'll meet at the Visitor's Center parking lot, hike for 2 to 3 hours, and then go to lunch.

Once again, this will be a hike, not a walk. I'd like to go at a moderate-to-brisk pace.
Please bring suitable footwear, plenty of water, and maybe even a snack or two.

We'll take a different route from last time in order to enjoy some downhill hiking as well as uphill.

Due to the location, carpooling is recommended. If you are interested in carpooling or offering
to drive, please say so in your RSVP.

Afterward we will head over to the Mountain Barn for lunch.
174 Worcester Road, Princeton MA
http://www.mountainba...

Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my # to the 'yes' list.
item.name: Wachusett Mountain Hike
